author: snoopdave
msg: - salt field to every one of the 66 forms in the Roller UI
- a filter that checks every incoming POST for the presence of a valid salt
- salt cache uses Roller cache infrastructure (therefore can be cluster friendly)

author: pfg
msg: Update Apache Lucene core to version 2.9.4.
The new version brings in many bugfixes and performance
improvements. Unfortunately this also means we lose the
Windows specific enhancements in the long_path.patch but
it must be expected the newer versions of Lucene will
We also bring in support for using preinstalled version 3

msg: first pass at IT fix since enums introduction
